rows.label: qev090807_MSG0001
rows.name: Have you heard the latest scuttlebutt from the general rabble?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090807_MSG0002
rows.name:
Rumors are flying that Commander Vandham's
successor is going to be one of the two of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090807_MSG0003
rows.name: I intend for it to be me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090807_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'll work my way up and drag BLADE
kicking and screaming into the modern era.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090807_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell H.B. you have no intention of
giving up the position to him.

rows.label: qev090807_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell H.B. you have no interest in such things.

rows.label: qev090807_MSG0005
rows.name:
That's what I expect from my rival.
It should be an exciting race to the top![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090807_MSG0007
rows.name:
I'm glad to hear it.
I know better than to cross you if I can avoid it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090807_MSG0008
rows.name:
In the meantime, let's continue our record
of one perfect mission after the next.[ST:wait ]
